a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Reported versus estimated cases of polio, World
Reported cases of polio may be an underestimate of actual cases because people with acute flaccid paralysis
may not be detected and tested for the poliovirus in time.
Data source: World Health Organization and Our World in Data adapted from Tebbens et al. (2010)
